channel.title: [PI] autodownloading cache
channel.description:
Hi,
well im here for some help, i have tried to use many guides to change my current client to auto-downlaod the cache but all seems to fail.. i have made pi webclients with older source and clients but this 1 doesnt want to work..
i need some real help to be honest...
this is my current client that im having trouble editing to auto-download the cache http://www.mediafire.com/?guec9e1zv2rj6ua
could some1 please help me with this i will pay $10-20 to who ever leads me to a perfect working version of my client that auto-downloads the cache and allows you to play normaly
thanks, dgk
